reviews.text: Spent four wonderful nights at the Schiffle. The hotel is a short walk to the center of town. The room was clean, comfortable, and quiet. The hotel's restaurant serves tasty regional cuisine (veal, lamb, etc.) at a reasonable price. Complementary breakfast is varied and satisfying. Staff could not be more helpful, including efforts to deal with Lufthansa after it cancelled my return flight. Reception staff speak English. Owner even drove me to the train station when it was time to leave. Would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Schiffle is a Pleasure

reviews.text: This hotel is a small (under 50 rooms) family operated hotel in the town of Hohenems, Austria and is within 10 minutes walking distance of the Jewish Museum of Hohenems. The hotel has a very fine restaurant with excellent regional food. This is a good place to stay to explore the region including Lindau, Bregenz, St. Gallen, Felkirke etc. and to hike in the surrounding mountains. The owners and staff speak English and are most accommodating and welcoming.
reviews.title: Fabulous Country Hotel
